summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for a Cingular Wireless account belonging to Martin Golick. It details the billing cycle, charges, payments, and usage for the specified period, including various fees and taxes associated with the account. This document details the voice usage and call activity for the phone number (561) 379-7824, associated with Martin Golick. It includes a log of incoming and outgoing calls, their durations, and the locations from which the calls were made, primarily focusing on Palm Beach, Florida. This document details the voice usage and multimedia messaging activity for the phone number (561) 379-7824, associated with Martin Golick, for the period leading up to June 15, 2005. It includes call logs, incoming and outgoing call details, and message retrievals, indicating frequent communication patterns.

persons.name: Martin Golick
persons.context: Martin Golick is the account holder for the Cingular Wireless account detailed in this document, which outlines his monthly charges and usage.

The billing cycle for the account began on May 15, 2005, and ended on June 14, 2005.
